titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the two Houses.

action.text: Resolution provides for consideration of a concurrent resolution for the adjournment of the House and Senate for the Independence Day District Work Period.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 176.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/26/1997--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from June 26, 1997, until July 8, 1997, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from June 26, 27, 28, or 29, 1997, until July 7, 1997.
